plot: James Ragan, a brilliant criminal lawyer is fed up with his lucrative practice and longs to retire to a quiet judgeship, but his reputation for legal, if not always ethical, courtroom tricks sidetracks his desire and he continues with his chosen profession. Afrer several exciting (and episodic) cases, requiring all his talents, including defending his personal bodyguard, &"Moose&" Hendrcks on a murder charge,he eventually get an appointment and becomes known as Judge Ragan.   Written by  Les Adams
title: Criminal Lawyer
